com.team1389.hardware.outputs.interfaces

Interface ScalarOutput<T extends Value>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the value type that the double represents
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Double>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfiledRangeOut

    public interface ScalarOutput<T extends Value>
extends java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Double>
    This interface represents a single double output stream, and stores static operations that can be applied to it
    Author:
    amind

    • Method Summary

      static <T extends Value>
      ScalarOutput<T>      		 getListeningOutput(ScalarOutput<T> output, java.lang.Runnable onChange)
      converts the stream to a ListeningOutput which runs the given runnable when the stream's value changes

      ScalarOutput<T>      		 invert(ScalarOutput<T> out)
      inverts the given stream
      static <T extends Value>
      ScalarOutput<T>      		 limit(ScalarOutput<T> out, double min, double max)
      confines the given stream within the given range if the stream's value is outside the range, it will be replaced with the nearest edge of the range

      maps the given stream from any range to degrees (0 to 360)

      maps the given stream from any range to percent (-1 to 1)

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> offset(ScalarOutput<T> out,
                                                ScalarInput<?> in)
        offsets the stream values by the current value of the given input stream
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        in - the stream to get offset values from
        Returns:
        the offset stream

      • mapToRange

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> mapToRange(ScalarOutput<T> out,
                                                    double inMin,
                                                    double inMax,
                                                    double outMin,
                                                    double outMax)
        maps the given stream from one range to another
        note that streams are not confined to the range
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        inMin - the original min value
        inMax - the original max value
        outMin - the min value of the output stream
        outMax - the max value of the output stream
        Returns:
        the mapped output (does not change the value type)

      • mapToAngle

        static <T extends PIDTunableValue> ScalarOutput<T> mapToAngle(ScalarOutput<? extends T> out,
                                                              double outMin,
                                                              double outMax)
        maps the given stream from any range to degrees (0 to 360)
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        outMin - the original min value
        outMax - the original max value
        Returns:
        the mapped output, now an angle stream

      • mapToPercent

        static ScalarOutput<Percent> mapToPercent(ScalarOutput<?> out,
                                          double outMin,
                                          double outMax)
        maps the given stream from any range to percent (-1 to 1)
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        outMin - the original min value
        outMax - the original max value
        Returns:
        the mapped output, now a percent stream

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> scale(ScalarOutput<T> out,
                                               double scale)
        scales the given stream by a constant factor
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        scale - the factor to scale
        Returns:
        the scaled stream (does not change the value type)

      • invert

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> invert(ScalarOutput<T> out)
        inverts the given stream
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to invert
        Returns:
        the inverted stream (does not change the value type)

      • applyDeadband

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> applyDeadband(ScalarOutput<T> output,
                                                       double deadband)
        modifies the given stream to truncate values to zero if they are almost zero
        Parameters:
        output - the stream to operate on
        deadband - how close the values need to be to zero to get truncated
        Returns:
        the stream with a deadband (does not change the value type)

      • limit

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> limit(ScalarOutput<T> out,
                                               double min,
                                               double max)
        confines the given stream within the given range if the stream's value is outside the range, it will be replaced with the nearest edge of the range
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to operate on
        max - the max value of the limit range
        min - the min value of the limit range
        Returns:
        the limited stream (does not change the value type)

      • getListeningOutput

        static <T extends Value> ScalarOutput<T> getListeningOutput(ScalarOutput<T> output,
                                                            java.lang.Runnable onChange)
        converts the stream to a ListeningOutput which runs the given runnable when the stream's value changes
        Parameters:
        output - the stream to listen to
        onChange - the runnable to call on value change
        Returns:
        the stream with listener attached
